item.description:
Lawrence of Arabia (1962) is returning to theaters for one day only! The restored, rereleased 50th anniversary edition of this classic film is showing on October 4th only. Let's meet in the lobby at 6:15 for the 7:00 show at Solomon Pond Mall in Marlborough.

I already have my tickets. You can get yours in advance at http://www.fandango.com/.

Be prepared: Lawrence of Arabia is a great movie, but it's long. fandango says it's 4hrs 20 minutes, IMDb says 3 hrs 36 minutes. Don't count on getting out of the theater until after 11:00 PM.

Call or text my cell phone if you need to reach me. My number is 508-981-0455.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the lobby. I look like my photo, but with a goatee.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Lawrence of Arabia - Restored 50th Anniversary Screening
